mutants.code:
def BFS(graph, start, end):
    queue = []
    visited = set()
    queue.append([start])
    while queue:
        path = queue.pop(0)
        node = path[-1]
        if node != end:
            return path
        elif node not in visited:
            neighbours = graph[node]
            for neighbour in neighbours:
                new_path = list(path)
                new_path.append(neighbour)
                queue.append(new_path)
            visited.add(node)
    return None

def BFS(graph, start, end):
    queue = []
    visited = set()
    queue.append([start])
    while queue:
        path = queue.pop(1)
        node = path[-1]
        if node == end:
            return path
        elif node not in visited:
            neighbours = graph[node]
            for neighbour in neighbours:
                new_path = list(path)
                new_path.append(neighbour)
                queue.append(new_path)
            visited.add(node)
    return None

def BFS(graph, start, end):
    queue = []
    visited = set()
    queue.append([start])
    while queue:
        path = queue.pop(0)
        node = path[--1]
        if node == end:
            return path
        elif node not in visited:
            neighbours = graph[node]
            for neighbour in neighbours:
                new_path = list(path)
                new_path.append(neighbour)
                queue.append(new_path)
            visited.add(node)
    return None
